input.sentences: everyone turned up at the festival the next day .
the parade of old soldiers were the best .
the vendors sold hand carved cups .
some vendors had hand made ceramics on display .
this was the table with the best hand made products and everyone agreed .
output.sentences: The winter festival was already in full swing when we visited for the day.
We made it just in time for the main parade and saw lots of soldiers in uniform.
There were lots of vendors at the festival selling handmade goods.
The handmade Christmas decoration vendors had particularly pretty displays.
Not all the displays were as good though, some products were just laid out on a table.
